item.title: Economic Integration and Development from The Perspective of Dependency Theory
item.description: International trade and consequent interactions have become a crucial part of economic activity since the last century. The influence of trade has been deemed to be significant for economic development. The process of economic integration has been promoted by the World Trade Organisation especially, on the basis of the same argument. However, not all nations have been benefiting from economic integration and in fact it is possible that the reverse is happening.
